item.title: 人工智能的蓬勃发展正在给美国最大的电网带来压力
item.description:
自 6 月份以来，PJM Interconnection&bsp已为其网络发布了 9 次能源紧急警报。【原文：

PJM Interconnection has issued nine energy emergency alerts for its network since June.

】

item.title: 据说华润集团即将以 21 亿美元收购生态材料公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，建筑材料供应商 CRH Plc 正在就以 21 亿美元收购 Eco Material Technologies 进行深入谈判，这将是该公司在北美水泥替代品市场的一次重大扩张。【原文：Building-materials provider CRH Plc is in advanced talks to buy Eco Material Technologies for $2.1 billion in what would be a major expansion in the cement-alternatives market in North America, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 杜克将以 25 亿美元向 Spire 出售田纳西州天然气业务
item.description: 杜克能源公司同意以 25 亿美元的价格将田纳西皮德蒙特天然气业务出售给 Spire 公司。【原文：Duke Energy agreed to sell its Tennessee Piedmont Natural Gas business to Spire Inc. for $2.5 billion.】

item.title: 诺和诺德因减肥药销售不佳而下调业绩预期
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）在一份出人意料的最新报告中下调了财务预期，原因是其减肥药 Wegovy 的销售滞后，该公司在肥胖症市场上已被礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.该公司股价暴跌。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S slashed its financial forecast in a surprise update that cited lagging sales of its weight-loss drug Wegovy, as the company loses ground to Eli Lilly & Co. in the obesity market. The shares plunged.】

item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们关注的是唐纳德-特朗普总统为促进美国出口所做的努力。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册接收这份时事通讯，您可以在这里注册。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. item.title: SThree 表示，美欧关税协议将帮助欧洲恢复就业
item.description: SThree Plc 表示，美国和欧盟之间的贸易协议将有助于刺激 2026 年的招聘势头，帮助陷入困境的招聘行业摆脱长期放缓的局面。【原文：The trade deal between the US and the European Union will help spur hiring momentum in 2026, helping the beleaguered recruitment industry exit an extended slowdown, SThree Plc said.】

item.title: 从恶魔到下载：索尼动漫音乐走向主流
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，根岸真由美（Mayumi Negishi）和金昭熙（Sohee Kim）将探讨索尼为使动漫歌曲获得白金销量所做的努力。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Mayumi Negishi and Sohee Kim look at Sony’s push to make anime anthems go platinum.】

item.title: 彼得-蒂尔支持的风险债务公司 Tacora 筹集到 6.85 亿美元资金
item.description:
风险债务在初创企业融资中的地位日益重要。【原文：

Venture debt is an increasingly important piece of startup world financing.

】

item.title: 欧盟正在仔细研究与特朗普达成的关税协议细则
item.description: 美国和欧盟握手达成贸易协议不到 48 小时，市场和越来越多的批评者就开始怀疑在苏格兰达成的初步协议能否稳定跨大西洋关系。【原文：It took less than 48 hours after the US and European Union’s handshake trade deal for markets and a growing chorus of critics to start wondering whether the preliminary agreement forged in Scotland will stabilize transatlantic relations.】

item.title: 价值 230 亿美元的 CMBS 相关贷款陷入瘫痪
item.description: 随着大流行病的连锁反应继续在整个行业产生影响，更多的商业房地产债务正进入休眠状态。【原文：More commercial real estate debt is entering a state of suspended animation as the ripple effects from the pandemic continue to reverberate through the industry.】

item.title: 高收入者也拖欠信用卡和汽车还款
item.description: 高收入美国人越来越多地拖欠信用卡和汽车贷款还款，这表明随着劳动力市场放缓，美国经济存在潜在的脆弱性。【原文：Upper-income Americans are increasingly falling behind on credit card and auto loan payments, signaling an underlying vulnerability in the US economy as the labor market slows.】

item.title: 微软获取 OpenAI 技术是合同谈判的焦点
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）正在进行深入谈判，以达成一项协议，使其能够持续获得关键的 OpenAI 技术。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is in advanced talks to land a deal that could give it ongoing access to critical OpenAI technology, an agreement that would remove a major obstacle to the startup’s efforts to become a for-profit enterprise.】

item.title: 智利央行将在 2025 年首次降息
item.description: 智利央行可能在周二将利率下调四分之一个百分点，这是今年以来首次降低借贷成本，因为政策制定者抓住了通胀前景改善的机会。【原文：Chile’s central bank will likely cut its interest rate by a quarter-point on Tuesday, lowering borrowing costs for the first time this year as policymakers seize on an improving inflation outlook.】

item.title: 英国大流行病后的学生住房热潮开始消退
item.description: 科维德事件后，英国的学生公寓建设热潮出现了更多放缓的迹象。【原文：The post-Covid student housing boom in the UK is showing more signs of slowing.】

item.title: 政策制定者称捷克房价飙升预示宽松政策结束
item.description: 一位高级决策者表示，捷克降息 "几乎肯定 "暂时结束，因为央行正在应对房地产价格飙升、消费者支出和经济前景改善带来的通胀风险。【原文：Czech interest-rate cuts are “almost certainly” over for now as the central bank tackles inflation risks from soaring property prices, consumer spending and an improving economic outlook, a senior policymaker said.】

item.title: 据说淡马锡将持有杰尼亚 10%的股份
item.description: 淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）正在收购意大利时装品牌杰尼亚集团（Ermenegildo Zegna Group）10%的股份，价值约 2.2 亿美元，以拓展奢侈品业务。【原文：Temasek Holdings Pte is building a 10% stake in Italian fashion house Ermenegildo Zegna Group worth about $220 million as it expands in luxury.】

item.title: Spotify 第二季度出现亏损，业绩未达预期
item.description: 音乐流媒体服务公司 Spotify Technology SA 第二季度出现亏损，低于分析师的预期，原因是与员工薪酬相关的支出高于预期。【原文：Spotify Technology SA swung to a loss in the second quarter, missing analysts’ estimates after the music-streaming service recorded higher-than-expected expenses related to employee compensation.】

item.title: 沙普尔吉获得 RBI 豁免，避免私人债务收益率上升
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度 Shapoorji Pallonji 集团已从银行监管机构获得了一项关键的监管豁免，减轻了其 34 亿美元私人信贷交易的压力，避免了借款成本的增加。【原文：India’s Shapoorji Pallonji Group has secured a key regulatory waiver from the banking regulator, easing pressure on its landmark $3.4 billion private credit deal and averting an increase in the cost of that borrowing, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说依维柯接近与莱昂纳多和塔塔签订国防和商业合同
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，依维柯集团（Iveco Group NV）即将达成一项交易，将其防务部门出售给莱昂纳多公司（Leonardo SpA），并将商用卡车业务出售给印度塔塔汽车公司（Tata Motors Ltd.）。【原文：Iveco Group NV is nearing a deal to sell its defense unit to Leonardo SpA and the commercial trucking business to India’s Tata Motors Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 联合健康发布低于华尔街预期的最新指导性报告
item.description: 联合健康集团公司（UnitedHealth Group Inc.【原文：UnitedHealth Group Inc. set a new earnings target below Wall Street’s estimates for the year, another sign of difficulty for the health-care giant as it tries to regain investors’ confidence.】

item.title: IPhone制造商鸿海的股票在披露信息前停牌
item.description: 在披露市场敏感信息之前，鸿海精密工业股份有限公司（Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.【原文：Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.’s shares have been suspended from trading ahead of the disclosure of market-sensitive information, an unusual move that suggests an important announcement Wednesday.】

item.title: CaixaBank 正寻求出售约 9 亿欧元的不良贷款
item.description: 西班牙储蓄银行（CaixaBank SA）正在与投资者洽谈出售约 9 亿欧元（10.4 亿美元）的不良贷款，因为这家西班牙贷款机构正在加速清理其资产负债表。【原文：CaixaBank SA is in talks with investors to sell about €900 million ($1.04 billion) in soured loans as the Spanish lender accelerates the clean-up of its balance sheet.】

item.title: 三得利首席执行官称日本央行 "必须提高利率
item.description: 三得利控股有限公司（Suntory Holdings Ltd.）首席执行官兼日本企业高管协会（Japan Association of Corporate Executives）主席新南武（Takeshi Niinami）表示，日本央行应在本周政策委员会会议上提高利率，否则将削弱日元并加剧通胀。【原文：Japan’s central bank should raise rates when its policy board meets this week, and failure to do so will weaken the yen and exacerbate inflation, said Takeshi Niinami, chief executive officer of Suntory Holdings Ltd. and chair of the Japan Association of Corporate Executives.】

item.title: 新加坡董事在庞氏骗局后需承担 6.54 亿美元的赔偿责任
item.description: 高等法院裁定，资不抵债的 Envy 集团公司的两名前董事应对投资者在镍币交易骗局和新加坡有史以来最大的庞氏骗局中损失的多达 6.54 亿美元负责。【原文：Two former directors of the insolvent Envy Group of companies are liable to investors for as much as $654 million lost in a nickel-trading scam and Singapore’s largest-ever Ponzi scheme, the High Court ruled.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯开发商 3.36 亿美元首次公开募股数分钟内售罄
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士称，沙特阿拉伯 Dar Al Majed 房地产公司在利雅得首次公开发行 12.6 亿里亚尔（约合 3.36 亿美元）的股票，在开盘后几分钟内就出现了抢购潮。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Dar Al Majed Real Estate Co. saw demand for all shares on offer in its 1.26 billion riyals ($336 million) initial public offering within minutes of books opening on the deal in Riyadh, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 这轮股市反弹取决于看涨的科技财报
item.description:
微软、Meta、苹果和亚马逊将在未来两天发布报告。【原文：

Microsoft, Meta, Apple and Amazon report over the next two days.

】

item.title: 估值攀升，华尔街坚持股票牛市论调
item.description: 华尔街策略师向投资者传达了一个信息，他们担心随着美股延续创纪录的上涨势头，会出现过度乐观的迹象：任何短期回调都可能创造买入机会。【原文：Wall Street strategists have a message for investors worrying about signs of excessive optimism emerging as US stocks extend their record run: Any near-term pullback will likely create a buying opportunity.】

item.title: 菲律宾顶级银行发行全国最大私人债券
item.description: BDO Unibank Inc. 从菲律宾最大的公司债券销售中筹集了 1,150 亿比索（20 亿美元）的资金，凸显了寻求有吸引力回报的投资者的强劲需求。【原文：BDO Unibank Inc. raised 115 billion pesos ($2 billion) from the Philippines’ largest corporate bond sale, highlighting strong demand from investors seeking attractive return.】

item.title: 一位年轻的 DOGE 程序员拆解美国体制的肖像
item.description:
卢克-法里托本可以成为一名艺术家、一名建筑师，或者一名致力于揭开伟大历史谜团的人。相反，他却在政府效率部工作，大肆砍伐、拆除、破坏。【原文：

Luke Farritor could have been an artist, or a builder, or someone dedicated to seeing a great historical mystery through. Instead he wound up at the Department of Government Efficiency, slashing, dismantling, undoing.

】

item.title: 税收上调后市场趋于稳定，英国抵押贷款申请量上升
item.description: 随着房地产市场继续摆脱 4 月份增税的影响，6 月份英国住房贷款开绿灯的数量升至三个月来的新高。【原文：The number of UK home loans given the green light rose to a three-month high in June, as the housing market continued to shake off the impact of April’s tax hike.】
